/>
VIII.i.3.D.1.c
.
Rating a Claim Based on Other Covered Birth Defects
The table below provides guidance for the rating activity to follow when making a decision on other covered birth defect claims.
If the claimed disability is ...
Then ...
not a covered birth defect, per
38 CFR 3.815 (c)(3) and (d)
prepare a rating decision denying the claim.
a covered birth defect per
38 CFR 3.815 (c)(3) and (d)
prepare a rating decision establishing entitlement, as
Level I
Level II
Level III,
Level IV,
or
Level 0, if the individual has no current disability resulting from a covered birth defect,
and
determine a beginning date of entitlement as provided in
38 CFR 3.815(i)
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Rating
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D
